ViewObject.Name: ODAdditionalLinkTerrIdVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT rrl.attribute15 terr_id FROM apps.XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V v, apps.jtf_rs_group_members mem, apps.jtf_rs_role_relations rrl WHERE mem.group_member_id = rrl.role_resource_id AND NVL(rrl.delete_flag, 'N') <> 'Y' AND NVL(mem.delete_flag, 'N') <> 'Y' AND rrl.role_resource_type = 'RS_GROUP_MEMBER' AND rrl.role_id = v.resource_role_id and mem.resource_id= v.resource_id and mem.group_id= v.group_id and v.entity_id=:1 and v.entity_type=:2
